Package dao

Class Dao_candidate

java.lang.Object
dao.Dao_candidate
public class Dao_candidate
extends java.lang.Object
This Data Access Object class contains methods that work in conjunction with the Candidate class. It establishes a connection with the electionmachine DB and its methods allow for the performing of CRUD operations on said data through the utilization of attributes from the aforementioned class.
Version:
3.0
Author:
HAMK's Finest Date: April 14, 2021

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Dao_candidate​(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String user, java.lang.String pass)
    String based parameterized constructor for Dao_question class.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void deleteCandidate​(java.lang.String id)
    CRUD method operates utilizing Candidate class instance and connection established as conn to perform SQL delete statement based on CANDIDATE_ID from candidates table.
    boolean getConnection()
    Method attempts to establish a DB connection based on supplied attributes if one does not exist already.
    void insertCandidate​(Candidate c)
    CRUD method operates utilizing Candidate class instance and connection established as conn to perform insert SQL statement on candidates table.
    java.util.ArrayList<Candidate> loginCandidate​(java.lang.String login_sql)
    CRUD method operates utilizing Candidate class instance and connection established as conn to iterate over candidates table checking for a USERNAME and PASSWORD from the respective columns that matches those provided in the arguments.
    java.util.ArrayList<Candidate> readAllCandidate()
    CRUD method operates utilizing Candidate class instance and connection established as conn to perform SQL select statement reading all candidates from the candidates table.
    java.util.ArrayList<Candidate> readAllCandidateDesc()
    CRUD method operates utilizing Candidate class instance and connection established as conn to perform SQL select statement reading all candidates in descending order from the candidates table.
    Candidate readCandidate​(java.lang.String id)
    CRUD method operates utilizing Candidate class instance and connection established as conn to run SQL command in candidates table reading all candidates from the table that match the provided CANDIDATE_ID.
    void updateCandidate​(Candidate c)
    CRUD method operates utilizing Candidate class instance and connection established as conn to perform SQL update statement based on CANDIDATE_ID and Candidate instance with loaded attributes for DB update.

  • Constructor Details

    • Dao_candidate

      public Dao_candidate​(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String user, java.lang.String pass)
      String based parameterized constructor for Dao_question class.
      Parameters:
      url - takes String arg of url for to connecto to.
      user - takes String arg of username for user to access DB.
      pass - takes String arg of password for user to access DB.

  • Method Details

    • getConnection

      public boolean getConnection()
      Method attempts to establish a DB connection based on supplied attributes if one does not exist already. Method requires JDBC driver.
      Returns:
      boolean value representing connection success or failure.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - error

    • insertCandidate

      public void insertCandidate​(Candidate c)
      CRUD method operates utilizing Candidate class instance and connection established as conn to perform insert SQL statement on candidates table. Candidate instance is loaded with attributes to populate into DB.
      Parameters:
      c - takes instance of Candidate object with attributes loaded matching columns of candidates table.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - exception.

    • updateCandidate

      public void updateCandidate​(Candidate c)
      CRUD method operates utilizing Candidate class instance and connection established as conn to perform SQL update statement based on CANDIDATE_ID and Candidate instance with loaded attributes for DB update.
      Parameters:
      c - takes instance of Candidate object with attributes loaded matching columns of candidates table.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - exception.

    • deleteCandidate

      public void deleteCandidate​(java.lang.String id)
      CRUD method operates utilizing Candidate class instance and connection established as conn to perform SQL delete statement based on CANDIDATE_ID from candidates table.
      Parameters:
      id - takes String arg for CANDIDATE_ID in candidates table where rows are to be deleted.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - exception.

    • readAllCandidate

      public java.util.ArrayList<Candidate> readAllCandidate()
      CRUD method operates utilizing Candidate class instance and connection established as conn to perform SQL select statement reading all candidates from the candidates table. ResultSet is iterated over in order to populate Candidate instance attributes with values from table.
      Returns:
      Candidate instance with attributes populated from DB.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - exception.

    • readAllCandidateDesc

      public java.util.ArrayList<Candidate> readAllCandidateDesc()
      CRUD method operates utilizing Candidate class instance and connection established as conn to perform SQL select statement reading all candidates in descending order from the candidates table. ResultSet is iterated over in order to populate Candidate instance attributes with values from table.
      Returns:
      Candidate instance with attributes populated in reverse order from DB.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - exception.

    • loginCandidate

      public java.util.ArrayList<Candidate> loginCandidate​(java.lang.String login_sql)
      CRUD method operates utilizing Candidate class instance and connection established as conn to iterate over candidates table checking for a USERNAME and PASSWORD from the respective columns that matches those provided in the arguments. Candidate instance attributes are utilized for the operation. NOTE: LoginServlet utilizing the method has built in SQL statement that reads login info from browser input.
      Parameters:
      login_sql - takes String arg of full SQL command to check USERNAME and PASSWORD.
      Returns:
      Candidate instance with USERNAME, PASSWORD and CANDIDATE_ID of candidate matching input arg containing username and password.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - exception.

    • readCandidate

      public Candidate readCandidate​(java.lang.String id)
      CRUD method operates utilizing Candidate class instance and connection established as conn to run SQL command in candidates table reading all candidates from the table that match the provided CANDIDATE_ID. Attributes of instance are set through iteration of ResultSet.
      Parameters:
      id - takes String arg matching CANDIDATE_ID of rows to be returned.
      Returns:
      instance of Candidate class with parameters populated for specified CANDIDATE_ID.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - exception.
